name: cl_crosshair_t
help: Removes the top line from the crosshair :0: normal crosshair,1: crosshair without top.

name: cl_crosshairalpha
help: Change the amount of transparency.

name: cl_crosshaircolor_b
help: Changes the color of the crosshair.

name: cl_crosshaircolor_g
help: Changes the color of the crosshair.

name: cl_crosshaircolor_r
help: Changes the color of the crosshair.

name: cl_crosshairdot
help: Decides if there is a dot in the middle of the crosshair

name: cl_crosshairgap
help: Changes the distance of the crosshair lines from the center of screen.

name: cl_crosshairsize
help: Changes the size of the crosshair.

name: cl_crosshairthickness
help: Changes the thinkness of the crosshair lines.

name: cl_quickhud_alpha
help: Change the amount of transparency.

name: cl_quickhudleftcolor_b
help: Changes the color of the left quickhud.

name: cl_quickhudleftcolor_g
help: Changes the color of the left quickhud.

name: cl_quickhudleftcolor_r
help: Changes the color of the left quickhud.

name: cl_quickhudrightcolor_b
help: Changes the color of the right quickhud.

name: cl_quickhudrightcolor_g
help: Changes the color of the right quickhud.

name: cl_quickhudrightcolor_r
help: Changes the color of the right quickhud.

name: cond
help: cond \<condition> \<command> [args]... - runs a command only if a given condition is met

name: conds
help: conds [\<condition> \<command>]... [else] - runs the first command which has a satisfied condition

name: ghost_chat
help: ghost_chat - open the chat HUD for messaging other players

name: ghost_connect
help: ghost_connect \<ip address> \<port> - connect to the server ex: 'localhost 53000' - '127.0.0.1 53000' - '89.10.20.20 53000'.

name: ghost_debug
help: ghost_debug - output a fuckton of debug info about network ghosts

name: ghost_delete_all
help: ghost_delete_all - delete all ghosts

name: ghost_delete_by_ID
help: ghost_delete_by_ID \<ID> - delete the ghost selected

name: ghost_demo_color
help: ghost_demo_color \<color> \<ID>  - sets the color of ghost

name: ghost_disconnect
help: ghost_disconnect - disconnect

name: ghost_draw_through_walls
help: Whether to draw ghosts through walls. 0 = none, 1 = names, 2 = names and ghosts.

name: ghost_height
help: Height of the ghosts. (For prop models, only affects their position).

name: +ghost_leaderboard
help: +ghost_leaderboard - enable the ghost leaderboard HUD

name: -ghost_leaderboard
help: -ghost_leaderboard - disable the ghost leaderboard HUD

name: ghost_leaderboard_font
help: The font to use for the ghost leaderboard.

name: ghost_leaderboard_max_display
help: The maximum number of names to display on the leaderboard.

name: ghost_leaderboard_mode
help: The mode for the leaderboard. 0 = CM, 1 = race

name: ghost_leaderboard_reset
help: ghost_leaderboard_reset - reset all leaderboard entries to "no time".

name: ghost_leaderboard_x
help: The x position of the leaderboard.

name: ghost_leaderboard_y
help: The x position of the leaderboard.

name: +ghost_list
help: +ghost_list - enable the ghost list HUD

name: -ghost_list
help: -ghost_list - disable the ghost list HUD

name: ghost_list
help: ghost_list - list all players in the current ghost server

name: ghost_list_font
help: Font index for ghost list HUD.

name: ghost_list_mode
help: Mode for ghost list HUD. 0 = all players, 1 = current map

name: ghost_list_show_map
help: Show the map name in the ghost list HUD.

name: ghost_list_x
help: X position of ghost list HUD.

name: ghost_list_y
help: Y position of ghost list HUD.

name: ghost_message
help: ghost_message - send message to other players

name: ghost_name
help: ghost_name - change your online name

name: ghost_name_font_size
help: The size to render ghost names at.

name: ghost_net_dump
help: Dump all ghost network activity to a file for debugging.

name: ghost_net_dump_mark
help: Mark a point of interest in the ghost network activity dump.

name: ghost_offset
help: ghost_offset \<offset> \<ID> - delay the ghost start by \<offset> frames

name: ghost_opacity
help: Opacity of the ghosts.

name: ghost_ping
help: Pong!

name: ghost_prop_model
help: ghost_prop_model \<filepath> - set the prop model. Example: models/props/metal_box.mdl

name: ghost_proximity_fade
help: Distance from ghosts at which their models fade out.

name: ghost_recap
help: ghost_recap - recap all ghosts setup

name: ghost_reset
help: ghost_reset - reset ghosts

name: ghost_set_color
help: ghost_set_color \<hex code> - sets the ghost color to the specified sRGB color code

name: ghost_set_demo
help: ghost_set_demo \<demo> [ID] - ghost will use this demo. If ID is specified, will create or modify the ID-th ghost

name: ghost_set_demos
help: ghost_set_demos \<first_demo> [first_id] [ID] - ghost will setup a speedrun with first_demo, first_demo_2, etc. If first_id is specified as e.g. 5, will instead start from first_demo_5, then first_demo_6, etc. Specifying first_id as 1 will use first_demo, first_demo_2 etc as normal. If ID is specified, will create or modify the ID-th ghost.

name: ghost_shading
help: Enable simple light level based shading for overlaid ghosts.

name: ghost_show_advancement
help: Show the advancement of the ghosts. 1 = show finished runs on the current map, 2 = show all finished runs, 3 = show all finished runs and map changes

name: ghost_show_names
help: Whether to show names above ghosts.

name: ghost_show_spec_chat
help: Show chat messages from spectators when not spectating.

name: ghost_spec_connect
help: ghost_spec_connect \<ip address> \<port> - connect to the server as a spectator ex: 'localhost 53000' - '127.0.0.1 53000' - '89.10.20.20 53000'.

name: ghost_spec_next
help: ghost_spec_next [samemap] - spectate the next ghost

name: ghost_spec_pov
help: ghost_spec_pov \<name

name: ghost_spec_prev
help: ghost_spec_prev - spectate the previous ghost

name: ghost_spec_see_spectators
help: Whether to see other spectators while spectating.

name: ghost_spec_thirdperson
help: Whether to spectate ghost from a third-person perspective.

name: ghost_spec_thirdperson_dist
help: The maximum distance from which to spectate in third-person.

name: ghost_start
help: ghost_start - start ghosts

name: ghost_sync
help: When loading a new level, pauses the game until other players load it.

name: ghost_sync_countdown
help: The number of seconds of countdown to show at the start of every synced map. 0 to disable.

name: ghost_TCP_only
help: Lathil's special command :).

name: ghost_text_offset
help: Offset of the name over the ghosts.

name: ghost_type
help: ghost_type \<0/1/2/3/4>: 0: Colored circle 1: Colored pyramid 2: Colored pyramid with portal gun (RECORDED IN DEMOS) 3: Prop model (RECORDED IN DEMOS) 4: Bendy

name: ghost_update_rate
help: Adjust the update rate. For people with lathil's internet.

name: hwait
help: hwait \<tick> \<command> [args...] - run a command after the given number of host ticks

name: nop
help: nop [args]... - nop ignores all its arguments and does nothing

name: sar_about
help: sar_about - prints info about SAR plugin

name: sar_achievement_tracker_ignore_coop
help: When set, achievement tracker ignores coop-specific achievements.

name: sar_achievement_tracker_reset
help: sar_achievement_tracker_reset - resets the status of achievement tracker.

name: sar_achievement_tracker_show
help: Enables achievement tracker toasts (using tag "achievements").

name: sar_achievement_tracker_status
help: sar_achievement_tracker_status - shows achievement completion status.

name: sar_aim_point_add
help: sar_aim_point_add - add frozen aimpoint at current position

name: sar_aim_point_clear
help: sar_aim_point_clear - clear all frozen aimpoints

name: sar_aim_point_hud
help: Overlays a marker with coordinates at the point you're aiming at

name: sar_aircontrol
help: Enables more air-control on the server.

name: sar_alias
help: sar_alias \<name> [command] [args]... - create an alias, similar to the 'alias' command but not requiring quoting. If no command is specified, prints the given alias

name: sar_alias_run
help: sar_alias_run \<name> [args]... - run a SAR alias, passing on any additional arguments

name: sar_allow_resizing_window
help: EXPERIMENTAL! Forces resizing on game's window.

name: sar_always_transmit_heavy_ents
help: Always transmit large but seldom changing edicts to clients to prevent lag spikes.

name: sar_autojump
help: Enables automatic jumping on the server.

name: sar_autorecord
help: Enables or disables automatic demo recording.

name: sar_avg_result
help: sar_avg_result - prints result of average

name: sar_avg_start
help: sar_avg_start - starts calculating the average when using timer

name: sar_avg_stop
help: sar_avg_stop - stops average calculation

name: sar_bink_respect_host_time
help: Make BINK video playback respect host time.

name: sar_cam_control
help: sar_cam_control \<type>: Change type of camera control. 0 = Default (camera is controlled by game engine), 1 = Drive mode (camera is separated and can be controlled by user input), 2 = Cinematic mode (camera is controlled by predefined path). 3 = Follow mode (Camera is following the player but not rotating, useful when strafing on gel).

name: sar_cam_drive
help: Enables or disables camera drive mode in-game (turning it on is not required for demo player)

name: sar_cam_force_eye_pos
help: Forces camera to be placed exactly on the player's eye position

name: sar_cam_ortho
help: Enables or disables camera orthographic projection.

name: sar_cam_ortho_nearz
help: Changes the near Z plane of orthographic projection.

name: sar_cam_ortho_scale
help: Changes the scale of orthographic projection (how many units per pixel).

name: sar_cam_path_export
help: sar_cam_path_export \<filename> [format] [framerate] - exports current camera path to a given file in given format. Available formats: kf - default, exports commands that can be used to recreate camera path. Does not use rate parameter. raw - exports a dump of raw camera position for each frame in given framerate (60 by default). davinci - exports a script for DaVinci Resolve's Camera 3D Fusion component based on raw camera dump.

name: sar_cam_path_getkfs
help: sar_cam_path_getkfs - exports commands for recreating currently made camera path

name: sar_cam_path_interp
help: Sets interpolation type between keyframes for cinematic camera. 0 = Linear interpolation 1 = Cubic spline 2 = Piecewise Cubic Hermite Interpolating Polynomial (PCHIP)

name: sar_cam_path_remkf
help: sar_cam_path_remkf \<frame> - removes camera path keyframe at specified frame

name: sar_cam_path_remkfs
help: sar_cam_path_remkfs - removes all camera path keyframes

name: sar_cam_path_setkf
help: sar_cam_path_setkf [frame] [x] [y] [z] [yaw] [pitch] [roll] [fov] - sets the camera path keyframe

name: sar_cam_path_showkf
help: sar_cam_path_showkf \<frame> - display information about camera path keyframe at specified frame

name: sar_cam_path_showkfs
help: sar_cam_path_showkfs - display information about all camera path keyframes

name: sar_cam_reset
help: sar_cam_reset - resets camera to its default position

name: sar_cam_setang
help: sar_cam_setang \<pitch> \<yaw> [roll] - sets camera angle (requires camera Drive Mode)

name: sar_cam_setfov
help: sar_cam_setfov \<fov> - sets camera field of view (requires camera Drive Mode)

name: sar_cam_setpos
help: sar_cam_setpos \<x> \<y> \<z> - sets camera position (requires camera Drive Mode)

name: sar_challenge_autostop
help: Automatically stops recording demos when the leaderboard opens after a CM run. If 2, automatically appends the run time to the demo name.

name: sar_challenge_autosubmit_reload_api_key
help: sar_challenge_autosubmit_reload_api_key - reload the board.portal2.sr API key from its file.

name: sar_chat
help: sar_chat - open the chat HUD

name: sar_cheat_hud
help: Display a warning in the HUD when cheats are active. 0 = disable, 1 = display if sv_cheats off, 2 = display always

name: sar_cheat_hud_x
help: X position of the cheat warning HUD.

name: sar_cheat_hud_y
help: Y position of the cheat warning HUD.

name: sar_check_update
help: sar_check_update [release

name: sar_clear_lines
help: sar_clear_lines - clears all active drawline overlays

name: sar_cm_rightwarp
help: Fix CM wrongwarp.

name: sar_con_filter
help: Enable the console filter

name: sar_con_filter_allow
help: sar_con_filter_allow \<string> [end] - add an allow rule to the console filter, allowing until 'end' is matched

name: sar_con_filter_block
help: sar_con_filter_block \<string> [end] - add a disallow rule to the console filter, blocking until 'end' is matched

name: sar_con_filter_default
help: Whether to allow text through the console filter by default

name: sar_con_filter_reset
help: sar_con_filter_reset - clear the console filter rule list

name: sar_con_filter_suppress_blank_lines
help: Whether to suppress blank lines in console

name: sar_coop_reset_progress
help: sar_coop_reset_progress - resets all coop progress

name: sar_cps_add
help: sar_cps_add - saves current time of timer

name: sar_cps_clear
help: sar_cps_clear - resets saved times of timer

name: sar_cps_result
help: sar_cps_result - prints result of timer checkpoints

name: sar_crosshair_mode
help: Set the crosshair mode : 0: Default crosshair 1: Customizable crosshair 2: Crosshair from .png

name: sar_crosshair_P1
help: Use the P1 crosshair style.

name: sar_crosshair_set_texture
help: sar_crosshair_set_texture \<filepath>

name: sar_cvarlist
help: sar_cvarlist - lists all SAR cvars and unlocked engine cvars

name: sar_cvars_dump
help: sar_cvars_dump - dumps all cvars to a file

name: sar_cvars_dump_doc
help: sar_cvars_dump_doc - dumps all SAR cvars to a file

name: sar_cvars_lock
help: sar_cvars_lock - restores default flags of unlocked cvars

name: sar_cvars_unlock
help: sar_cvars_unlock - unlocks all special cvars

name: sar_debug_listener
help: Prints event data of registered listener.

name: sar_delete_alias_cmds
help: sar_delete_alias_cmds - deletes all alias commands

name: sar_demo_blacklist
help: Stop a set of commands from being run by demo playback.

name: sar_demo_blacklist_addcmd
help: sar_demo_blacklist_addcmd \<command> - add a command to the demo blacklist

name: sar_demo_blacklist_all
help: Stop all commands from being run by demo playback.

name: sar_demo_overwrite_bak
help: Rename demos to (name)_bak if they would be overwritten by recording

name: sar_demo_portal_interp_fix
help: Fix eye interpolation through portals in demo playback.

name: sar_demo_remove_broken
help: Whether to remove broken frames from demo playback

name: sar_demo_replay
help: sar_demo_replay - play the last recorded or played demo

name: sar_disable_challenge_stats_hud
help: Disables opening the challenge mode stats HUD.

name: sar_disable_coop_score_hud
help: Disables the coop score HUD which appears in demo playback.

name: sar_disable_no_focus_sleep
help: Does not yield the CPU when game is not focused.

name: sar_disable_progress_bar_update
help: Disables excessive usage of progress bar.

name: sar_disable_save_status_hud
help: Disables the saving/saved HUD which appears when you make a save.

name: sar_disable_steam_pause
help: Prevents pauses from steam overlay.

name: sar_disable_weapon_sway
help: Disables the viewmodel lagging behind.

name: sar_dpi_scale
help: Fraction to scale mouse DPI down by.

name: sar_drawline
help: sar_drawline \<x> \<y> \<z> \<x> \<y> \<z> [r] [g] [b] - overlay a line in the world

name: sar_drawline_clear
help: sar_drawline_clear - clear all active sar_drawlines

name: sar_duckjump
help: Allows duck-jumping even when fully crouched, similar to prevent_crouch_jump.

name: sar_dump_client_classes
help: sar_dump_client_classes - dumps all client classes to a file

name: sar_dump_client_datamap
help: sar_dump_client_datamap - dumps client datmap to a file

name: sar_dump_events
help: sar_dump_events - dumps all registered game events of the game event manager

name: sar_dump_server_classes
help: sar_dump_server_classes - dumps all server classes to a file

name: sar_dump_server_datamap
help: sar_dump_server_datamap - dumps server datamap to a file

name: sar_echo
help: sar_echo \<color> \<string...> - echo a string to console with a given color

name: sar_echo_nolf
help: sar_echo_nolf \<color> \<string...> - echo a string to console with a given color and no trailing line feed

name: sar_ei_hud
help: Draws entity inspection data.

name: sar_ei_hud_font_color
help: RGBA font color of entity inspection HUD when not recording.

name: sar_ei_hud_font_color2
help: RGBA font color of entity inspection HUD when recording.

name: sar_ei_hud_font_index
help: Font index of entity inspection HUD.

name: sar_ei_hud_x
help: X offset of entity inspection HUD.

name: sar_ei_hud_y
help: Y offset of entity inspection HUD.

name: sar_ei_hud_z
help: Z offset of entity inspection HUD.

name: sar_ent_info
help: sar_ent_info [name] - show info about the entity under the crosshair or with the given name

name: sar_ent_slot_serial
help: sar_ent_slot_serial \<id> [value] - prints entity slot serial number, or sets it if additional parameter is specified.

name: sar_exit
help: sar_exit - removes all function hooks, registered commands and unloads the module

name: sar_expand
help: sar_expand [cmd]... - run a command after expanding svar substitutions

name: sar_export_stats
help: sar_export_stats \<filepath> -  export the stats to the specifed path in a .csv file

name: sar_fast_load_preset
help: sar_fast_load_preset \<preset> - sets all loading fixes to preset values

name: sar_fcps_anim_start
help: sar_fcps_anim_start \<id> - start animating the ID'th FCPS call.

name: sar_fcps_anim_step
help: sar_fcps_anim_step - step the FCPS animation forward.

name: sar_fcps_autostep
help: Time between automatic steps of FCPS animation. 0 to disable automatic stepping.

name: sar_fcps_clear
help: sar_fcps_clear - clear the FCPS event history.

name: sar_fcps_override
help: Override FCPS for tracing results.

name: sar_find_client_class
help: sar_find_client_class \<class_name> - finds specific client class tables and props with their offset

name: sar_find_ent
help: sar_find_ent \<m_iName> - finds entity in the entity list by name

name: sar_find_ents
help: sar_find_ents \<m_iClassName> - finds entities in the entity list by class name

name: sar_find_server_class
help: sar_find_server_class \<class_name> - finds specific server class tables and props with their offset

name: sar_fix_reloaded_cheats
help: Overrides map execution of specific console commands in Reloaded in order to separate map usage from player usage for these commands.

name: sar_font_get_name
help: sar_font_get_name \<id> - gets the name of a font from its index

name: sar_font_list
help: sar_font_list - lists all available fonts

name: sar_force_fov
help: sar_force_fov \<fov> - forces player FOV

name: sar_force_qc
help: When ducking, forces view offset to always be at standing height. Requires sv_cheats to work.

name: sar_function
help: sar_function \<name> [command] [args]... - create a function, replacing $1, $2 etc in the command string with the respective argument, and more. If no command is specified, prints the given function

name: sar_function_run
help: sar_function_run \<name> [args]... - run a function with the given arguments

name: sar_geteyepos
help: sar_geteyepos [slot] - get the view position (portal shooting origin) and view angles of a certain player.

name: sar_getpos
help: sar_getpos [slot] [server

name: sar_give_betsrighter
help: sar_give_betsrighter [n] - gives the player in slot n (0 by default) betsrighter.

name: sar_give_fly
help: sar_give_fly [n] - gives the player in slot n (0 by default) preserved crouchfly.

name: sar_groundframes_reset
help: sar_groundframes_reset - reset recorded groundframe statistics.

name: sar_groundframes_total
help: sar_groundframes_total [slot] - output a summary of groundframe counts for the given player slot.

name: sar_hud_angles
help: Draws absolute view angles of the client. 0 = Default, 1 = XY, 2 = XYZ.

name: sar_hud_avg
help: Draws calculated average of timer.

name: sar_hud_bg
help: Enable the SAR HUD background.

name: sar_hud_cps
help: Draws latest checkpoint of timer.

name: sar_hud_demo
help: Draws name, tick and time of current demo.

name: sar_hud_duckstate
help: Draw the state of player ducking. 1 - shows either ducked or standing state 2 - shows detailed report (requires sv_cheats)

name: sar_hud_ent_slot_serial
help: Draw the serial number of given entity slot.

name: sar_hud_eyeoffset
help: Draws player's eye offset. 0 = Default, 1 = eye offset including precision error, 2 = raw eye offset.

name: sar_hud_font_color
help: RGBA font color of HUD.

name: sar_hud_font_index
help: Font index of HUD.

name: sar_hud_frame
help: Draws current frame count.

name: sar_hud_fps
help: Show fps (frames per second) on the SAR hud. 1 - Show fps 2 - Show fps with fps cap

name: sar_hud_ghost_spec
help: Show the name of the ghost you're currently spectating.

name: sar_hud_grounded
help: Draws the state of player being on ground.

name: sar_hud_groundframes
help: Draws the number of ground frames since last landing. Setting it to 2 preserves the value.

name: sar_hud_groundspeed
help: Draw the speed of the player upon leaving the ground.

name: sar_hud_hide_text
help: sar_hud_hide_text \<id> - hides the nth text value in the HUD

name: sar_hud_inspection
help: Draws entity inspection data.

name: sar_hud_jump
help: Draws current jump distance.

name: sar_hud_jump_peak
help: Draws longest jump distance.

name: sar_hud_jumps
help: Draws total jump count.

name: sar_hud_last_frame
help: Draws last saved frame value.

name: sar_hud_last_session
help: Draws value of latest completed session.

name: sar_hud_orange_only
help: Only display the SAR HUD for orange, for solo coop (fullscreen PIP).

name: sar_hud_order_bottom
help: sar_hud_order_bottom \<name> - orders hud element to bottom

name: sar_hud_order_reset
help: sar_hud_order_reset - resets order of hud elements

name: sar_hud_order_top
help: sar_hud_order_top \<name> - orders hud element to top

name: sar_hud_pause_timer
help: Draws current value of pause timer.

name: sar_hud_portal_angles
help: Draw the camera angles of the last primary portal shot.

name: sar_hud_portal_angles_2
help: Draw the camera angles of the last secondary portal shot.

name: sar_hud_portals
help: Draws total portal count.

name: sar_hud_position
help: Draws absolute position of the client. 0 = Default, 1 = Player position, 2 = Camera (shoot) position.

name: sar_hud_precision
help: Precision of HUD numbers.

name: sar_hud_rainbow
help: Enables the rainbow HUD mode. -1 = default, 0 = disable, 1 = enable.

name: sar_hud_session
help: Draws current session tick.

name: sar_hud_set_text
help: sar_hud_set_text \<id> \<text>... - sets and shows the nth text value in the HUD

name: sar_hud_set_text_color
help: sar_hud_set_text_color \<id> [color] - sets the color of the nth text value in the HUD. Reset by not giving color.

name: sar_hud_show_text
help: sar_hud_show_text \<id> - shows the nth text value in the HUD

name: sar_hud_spacing
help: Spacing between elements of HUD.

name: sar_hud_steps
help: Draws total step count.

name: sar_hud_strafesync_color
help: RGBA font color of strafesync HUD.

name: sar_hud_strafesync_font_index
help: Font index of strafesync HUD.

name: sar_hud_strafesync_offset_x
help: X offset of strafesync HUD.

name: sar_hud_strafesync_offset_y
help: Y offset of strafesync HUD.

name: sar_hud_strafesync_split_offset_y
help: Y offset of strafesync HUD.

name: sar_hud_sum
help: Draws summary value of sessions.

name: sar_hud_tastick
help: Draws current TAS playback tick.

name: sar_hud_tbeam
help: Draw the name of the funnel player is currently in (requires sv_cheats).

name: sar_hud_tbeam_count
help: Draw the player's funnel count (requires sv_cheats).

name: sar_hud_text
help: DEPRECATED: Use sar_hud_set_text.

name: sar_hud_text
help: DEPRECATED: Use sar_hud_set_text.

name: sar_hud_timer
help: Draws current value of timer.

name: sar_hud_trace
help: Draws info about current trace bbox tick.

name: sar_hud_velang
help: Draw the angle of the player's horizontal velocity vector.

name: sar_hud_velocity
help: Draws velocity of the client. 0 = Default, 1 = X, Y, Z 2 = X:Y 3 = X:Y, Z 4 = X:Y:Z 5 = X, Y, X:Y, Z

name: sar_hud_velocity_peak
help: Draws last saved velocity peak.

name: sar_hud_velocity_precision
help: Precision of velocity HUD numbers.

name: sar_hud_x
help: X padding of HUD.

name: sar_hud_y
help: Y padding of HUD.

name: sar_ihud
help: Enables or disables movement inputs HUD of client.

name: sar_ihud_add_key
help: sar_ihud_add_key \<key>

name: sar_ihud_analog_image_scale

help: Increment automatically the demo name.

help: Render output FPS

name: sar_render_sample_rate

name: sar_render_shutter_angle

name: sar_render_skip_coop_videos

help: sar_tas_stop - stop TAS playing

name: sar_tas_tools_force

name: sar_timer_stop
help: sar_timer_stop - stops timer

name: sar_timer_time_pauses

name: sar_toast_disable

name: sar_toast_net_create
help: sar_toast_net_create \<tag> \<text> - create a toast, also sending it to your coop partner

name: sar_toast_net_disable
help: Disable network toasts.

name: sar_toast_setpos
help: sar_toast_setpos \<bottom

name: sar_toast_tag_dismiss_all
help: sar_toast_tag_dismiss_all \<tag> - dismiss all active toasts with the given tag

name: sar_toast_tag_set_color
help: sar_toast_tag_set_color \<tag> \<color> - set the color of the specified toast tag to an sRGB color

name: sar_toast_tag_set_duration
help: sar_toast_tag_set_duration \<tag> \<duration> - set the duration of the specified toast tag in seconds. The duration may be given as 'forever'

name: sar_toast_width
help: The maximum width for toasts.

name: sar_toast_x
help: The horizontal position of the toasts HUD.

name: sar_toast_y
help: The vertical position of the toasts HUD.

name: sar_togglewait
help: sar_togglewait - enables or disables "wait" for the command buffer

name: sar_trace_autoclear
help: Automatically clear the trace on session start

name: sar_trace_bbox_at
help: Display a player-sized bbox at the given tick.

name: sar_trace_bbox_ent_dist
help: Distance from which to capture entity hitboxes.

name: sar_trace_bbox_ent_draw
help: Draw hitboxes of nearby entities in the trace.

name: sar_trace_bbox_ent_record
help: Record hitboxes of nearby entities in the trace. You may want to disable this if memory consumption gets too high.

name: sar_trace_bbox_use_hover
help: Move trace bbox to hovered trace point tick on given trace.

name: sar_trace_clear
help: sar_trace_clear \<name> - Clear player trace with a given name

name: sar_trace_clear_all
help: sar_trace_clear_all - Clear all the traces

name: sar_trace_draw
help: Display the recorded player trace. Requires cheats

name: sar_trace_draw_speed_deltas
help: Display the speed deltas. Requires sar_trace_draw

name: sar_trace_draw_through_walls
help: Display the player trace through walls. Requires sar_trace_draw

name: sar_trace_draw_time
help: Display tick above trace hover info 0 = hide tick info 1 = ticks since trace recording started 2 = session timer 3 = TAS timer (if no TAS was played, uses 1 instead)

name: sar_trace_dump
help: sar_trace_dump \<tick> [player slot] [trace name] - dump the player state from the given trace tick on the given trace ID (defaults to 1) in the given slot (defaults to 0).

name: sar_trace_export
help: sar_trace_export \<filename> [trace name] - Export trace data into a csv file.

name: sar_trace_font_size
help: The size of text overlaid on recorded traces.

name: sar_trace_override
help: Clears old trace when you start recording to it instead of recording on top of it.

name: sar_trace_portal_opacity
help: Opacity of trace portal previews.

name: sar_trace_portal_oval
help: Draw trace portals as ovals rather than rectangles.

name: sar_trace_portal_record
help: Record portal locations.

name: sar_trace_record
help: Record the trace to a slot. Set to 0 for not recording

name: sar_trace_teleport_at
help: sar_trace_teleport_at \<tick> [player slot] [trace name] - teleports the player at the given trace tick on the given trace ID (defaults to hovered one or the first one ever made) in the given slot (defaults to 0).

name: sar_trace_teleport_eye
help: sar_trace_teleport_eye \<tick> [player slot] [trace name] - teleports the player to the eye position at the given trace tick on the given trace (defaults to hovered one or the first one ever made) in the given slot (defaults to 0).

name: sar_trace_use_shot_eyeoffset
help: Uses eye offset and angles accurate for portal shooting.

name: sar_update
help: sar_update [release

name: sar_velocitygraph
help: Shows velocity graph.

name: sar_velocitygraph_background
help: Background of velocity graph.

name: sar_velocitygraph_font_index
help: Font index of velocity graph.

name: sar_velocitygraph_rainbow
help: Rainbow mode of velocity graph text.

name: sar_velocitygraph_show_speed_on_graph
help: Show speed between jumps.

name: sar_vphys_hud
help: Enables or disables the vphys HUD.

name: sar_vphys_hud_font
help: Sets font of the vphys HUD.

name: sar_vphys_hud_precision
help: Sets decimal precision of the vphys HUD.

name: sar_vphys_hud_show_hitboxes
help: Sets visibility of hitboxes when vphys hud is active. 0 = hitboxes are not drawn 1 = only active vphys hitbox is drawn 2 = active vphys and player's bounding box are drawn 3 = both vphys hitboxes and player's bounding box are drawn

name: sar_vphys_hud_x
help: The x position of the vphys HUD.

name: sar_vphys_hud_y
help: The y position of the vphys HUD.

name: sar_vphys_setangle
help: sar_vphys_setangle \<hitbox> \<angle> - sets rotation angle to either standing (0) or crouching (1) havok collision shadow

name: sar_vphys_setasleep
help: sar_vphys_setasleep \<hitbox> \<asleep> - sets whether your standing (0) or crouching (1) havok collision shadow is asleep

name: sar_vphys_setgravity
help: sar_vphys_setgravity \<hitbox> \<enabled> - sets gravity flag state to either standing (0) or crouching (1) havok collision shadow

name: sar_vphys_setspin
help: sar_vphys_setspin \<hitbox> \<angvel> - sets rotation speed to either standing (0) or crouching (1) havok collision shadow

name: sar_workshop
help: sar_workshop \<file> [ss/changelevel] - same as "map" command but lists workshop maps

name: sar_workshop_list
help: sar_workshop_list - prints all workshop maps

name: sar_workshop_update
help: sar_workshop_update - updates the workshop map list

name: seq
help: seq \<commands>... - runs a sequence of commands one tick after one another

name: svar_abs
help: svar_abs \<variable> - perform the given operation on an svar

name: svar_add
help: svar_add \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_capture
help: svar_capture \<variable> \<command> [args]... - capture a command's output and place it into an svar, removing newlines

name: svar_ceil
help: svar_ceil \<variable> - perform the given operation on an svar

name: svar_count
help: svar_count - prints a count of all the defined svars

name: svar_div
help: svar_div \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_fadd
help: svar_fadd \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_fdiv
help: svar_fdiv \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_floor
help: svar_floor \<variable> - perform the given operation on an svar

name: svar_fmod
help: svar_fmod \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_fmul
help: svar_fmul \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_from_cvar
help: svar_from_cvar \<variable> \<cvar> - capture a cvar's value and place it into an svar, removing newlines

name: svar_fsub
help: svar_fsub \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_get
help: svar_get \<variable> - get the value of a svar

name: svar_mod
help: svar_mod \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_mul
help: svar_mul \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_no_persist
help: svar_no_persist \<variable> - unmark an svar as persistent

name: svar_persist
help: svar_persist \<variable> - mark an svar as persistent

name: svar_round
help: svar_round \<variable> - perform the given operation on an svar

name: svar_set
help: svar_set \<variable> \<value> - set a svar (SAR variable) to a given value

name: svar_sub
help: svar_sub \<variable> \<variable

name: svar_substr
help: svar_substr \<variable> \<from> [len] - sets a svar to its substring.

name: wait
help: wait \<tick> \<commands> - wait for the amount of ticks specified

name: wait_for
help: wait_for \<tick> \<commands> - wait for the amount of ticks specified

name: wait_mode
help: When the pending commands should be executed. 0 is absolute, 1 is relative to when you entered the wait command.

name: wait_persist_across_loads
help: Whether pending commands should be carried across loads (1) or just be dropped (0).

name: wait_to
help: wait_to \<tick> \<commands> - run this command on the specified session tick
